If you play your card correctly, the Duergar will reveal to you that there's an Adamantine Forge that they are looking for. Follow The Adamantine Forge quest guide to complete the quest and find the forge. Finish the Masterwork Weapon: Forge Sussur Weapons at a furnace after obtaining the blueprints.
